document_data.mainbody:
ergus Gunderson was an old farmer that lived in Roth√© Valley Village during the early 15 century DR.
He was believed to have been related to the young woman Cella Gunderson, and her uncle, the villages mayor some 50 years after Fergus time.
On one occasion, Fergus made a bet with a traveling wizard named Rucksam, the specifics of which had been lost to time. To win the bet, Rucksam created a tunnel in the valley, linking Fergus home village with nearby farms. As a result of his loss, Fergus had to pay the wizards bar tab every time again he visited the town.
